title: Mouse Glitch In Game
body: Today I opened up my laptop to play a game, and when I did, my mouse jumped around whenever I moved it. I alt-tabbed out of it to look it up, maybe other people were having the same problem. When I did so, all the problems went away! Only in-game it went off, and I tried this out on multiple mouses too. Can someone help?

replies.body:
Hmmm, you may have a background application trying to take window focus away from League while trying to display notifications. I'd recommend [completing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure those applications aren't interfering with League.

Let me know if this helped.
